verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] experienced unprecedented turnover , with one official after another either resigning or being fired for a whole litany of reasons , but one seems to be untouchable : EPA Administrator Scott Pruitt . Now it ’s been reported that he used an aide at the EPA to get a conservative group to hire his wife for …

Now it ’s been reported that he used an aide at the EPA to get a conservative group to hire his wife for …
